name: Mend Mark
description: I am Mend Mark by name, and i am a gentle man with a lovely heart , caring, honest, and i will like to meet a woman that is honest, caring, loving. I like people who are confident, positive, optimistic, value oriented, hard working, talk less and act more. In my spare time, which is usually at weekends, I try as much as i can to keep myself busy so I don’t feel the vacuum in my life,
